channel.title: Thieving help [delta 317]
channel.description:
i was wondering how i can stop it from disconnecting people after they level up in there thieving.
E.G a level 3 trys to level up his theiving he gains 1 level in it and then d/c's
it does this after every level
Can anybody help me.
-owner macca

DUDE WTF i dident ask for xp etc i said it disconnects people !

item.title: Thieving help [delta 317]
item.dc:creator: @Marine5287 Marine5287
item.description:
@Marine5287 wrote:

Go into client.java and there should be something like this:

if(objectID == 2561){ if(playerLevel[17] >= 1){ if(System.currentTimeMillis() - lastAction > actionInterval){ actionInterval = 4000; lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis(); addItem(995, 40000); addSkillXP(300, 17); setAnimation(881); } } }

Where it says addSkillXP is where you change the XP for thieving so it would go higher.

There was a question about this at the bottom of the page.

Read full topic
